metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1451 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds Read in r_bin_java_constant_value_attr_new function in GitHubrepository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0. The bug causes the programreads data past the end 2f the intented buffer. Typically, this can allowattackers to read sensitive information from other memory locations orcause a crash. More details see [CWE-125: Out-of-boundsread](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/125.html).

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
